about_the_game:
The epic conclusion of the 5-Part virtual reality experience!

The Exorcist: Legion VR - Chapter 5: The Tomb


You have been summoned to the final chapter... and there is no turning back.

In this tense climax, your journey takes you deep into the mountains of Upper Mesopotamia where one last confrontation with an ancient evil will put everything that you have learned to the test.

Make sure you have caught up on the story with Chapter 4!

[/url] [b]The Exorcist: Legion VR[/b] is an episodic story set in the world created by horror maestro William Peter Blatty. Delve deep into the heart of the supernatural as you learn the trade of demonic exorcism and uncover secrets leading you towards a final confrontation with your darkest, most hidden fears. [b]The Exorcist: Legion VR[/b] is part investigation, part exorcism... and all horror. Is your willpower strong enough? Developed from the ground up for HTC Vive and Oculus, [b]The Exorcist: Legion VR[/b] features support for tracked controllers as well as “blink” and “free roam” locomotion options and allows you to change them within the game to give you the most from your experience. [*]Multiple episodes, each featuring a different demonic entity. Buy each subsequent chapter from within the experience and face a new demon using a different weapon. [*]Each chapter runs approx. 25-30 minutes. Replay each chapter for additional secrets, achievements and performance and locate a variety of Easter eggs. [*]Realistic, sinister and completely immersive environments hide rich story clues and a variety of unique secrets
